content: or offline you can sell items made from this pattern provided they are handmade by yourself in a limited number and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling this item is handmade by your name from a design and pattern by megan lapp crafty intentions™ step by step photo tutorial 1 insert the hook into the bead 2 and pattern by megan lapp crafty intentions™ lightly beaded möbius strip fidget tools möbius color yarn medium/worsted/4 weight yarn or similar small approximately 20 yards medium approximately 30 yards large approximately 40 - 50 yards g 4 mm hook or a hook that will fit through your chosen beads beads for a small möbius strip fidget 16 - 32 beads row 1 5 for a medium möbius
